Class GeneralLedger

  • java.lang.Object
    • GeneralLedger
  • public class GeneralLedger
extends java.lang.Object
    The GeneralLedger class creates a GeneralLedger object that stores an ordered list of Transaction objects
    Author:
    Jie Zhang e-mail:jie.zhang.2@stonybrook.edu Stony Brook ID: 112645894 Data members: final static int MAX_TRANSACTIONS double totalDebitAmount double totalCreditAmount double credit double debit Transaction[] Ledger int totalTransaction

    • Constructor Detail

      • GeneralLedger

        public GeneralLedger()

    • Method Detail

      • addTransaction

        public void addTransaction​(Transaction newTransaction)
                    throws TransactionAlreadyExistsException,
                           FullGeneralLedgerException,
                           InvalidTransactionException
        Adds newTransaction into this GeneralLedger object if not already existed. In date order.
        Parameters:
        newTransaction - An Transaction object to be added to the ledger.
        Throws:
        TransactionAlreadyExistsException - Thrown if newTransaction is equal to one of the transaction objects in the list.
        FullGeneralLedgerException - Thrown if GeneralLedger is full and no room to record newTransaction.
        InvalidTransactionException - Thrown if newTransaction amount is 0 or if the date is invalid.

      • clone

        public java.lang.Object clone()
        Creates a deep copy of this GeneralLedger.
        Returns:
        A copy of this GeneralLedger object.

      • checkDate

        public boolean checkDate​(java.lang.String date)
        Checks if the date entered is in valid format and between 1900 to 2050, month 1-12, day 1-30.
        Parameters:
        date - The date string to be tested for validity.
        Returns:
        A boolean value to determine the validity of the date.

      • removeTransaction

        public void removeTransaction​(int position)
                       throws InvalidLedgerPositionException
        Removes the transaction object at position in this GeneralLedger.
        Parameters:
        position - The position of the Transaction to be removed.
        Throws:
        InvalidLedgerPositionException - Thrown if position is not valid.

      • getTransaction

        public Transaction getTransaction​(int position)
                           throws InvalidLedgerPositionException
        Returns the Transaction object located at position.
        Parameters:
        position - The position in this GeneralLedger to get.
        Returns:
        The Transaction object at the specified position.
        Throws:
        InvalidLedgerPositionException

      • filter

        public static void filter​(GeneralLedger generalLedger,
                          java.lang.String date)
        Prints all transactions with the specified date.
        Parameters:
        generalLedger - The ledger object to search in.
        date - The date of the transaction(s) to search for.

        Prints out the Transaction object located at position pos in the list.
        Parameters:
        pos - The position of the GeneralLedger object list to be printed.

      • insert

        public void insert​(int pos,
                   Transaction newTransaction)
        Inserts the Transaction object newTransaction into position pos in the list.
        Parameters:
        pos - The position in the list to add the Transaction object newTransaction.
        newTransaction - The Transaction object to be inserted into the list at position pos.

      • equals

        public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
        Checks if all the transactions in this GeneralLedger are equal to all the transactions in obj.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        obj - The obj to be checked for.
        Returns:
        true if all the transactions in this GeneralLedger are equal to all the transactions in obj, false otherwise.

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns the total number of Transaction objects in the list.
        Returns:
        The total number of Transaction objects in the list.

      • exists

        public boolean exists​(Transaction transaction)
               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Checks if a certain Transaction object is in the ledger list.
        Parameters:
        transaction - The Transaction object to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if this GeneralLedger contains transaction, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if transaction is not a valid Transaction object
